actions: Clears Heat, transforms Dampness, reduces Fire toxicity, activates the Blood and dispels Blood Stasis.
Clears Heat, alleviates pain, dissipates nodules and alleviates itching.

symptoms: The lesions have a slightly erythematous base
The scales are dry and powdery
The scales may be very thick on the scalp or
Pain and stiffness of the head and neck
Sores that are red, swollen and painful

notes: Grind the Rx. et Rz. Rhei Da Huang into a coarse powder. Put all of the ingredients into an airtight glass jar and allow to steep for 7 days. When the fluid turns dark brown, it is ready to apply. Apply to the affected sites with a sterile cotton swab 2-3 time daily.
